statements: SELECT * FROM DriverSchedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-20';
SELECT * FROM DriverSchedules WHERE shift_start_time < '08:00:00';
SELECT driver_id, schedule_date FROM DriverSchedules WHERE assigned_route_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM DriverSchedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-10-25' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM DriverSchedules WHERE assigned_route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM DriverSchedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, shift_start_time ASC, driver_id;
SELECT driver_id, schedule_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM DriverSchedules WHERE shift_end_time > '12:00:00' AND assigned_route_id IS NOT NULL;

SELECT driver_id, schedule_date, TIME(shift_start_time) AS start_time, TIME(shift_end_time) AS end_time FROM DriverSchedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_schedules, DATE(schedule_date) AS date FROM DriverSchedules GROUP BY schedule_date HAVING total_schedules > 2;
SELECT driver_id, assigned_route_id, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM shift_start_time) AS start_hour FROM DriverSchedules WHERE shift_start_time BETWEEN '08:00' AND '12:00' ORDER BY start_hour ASC, driver_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedule WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM assignment WHERE driver_id = 2;
SELECT driver_id, schedule_date FROM driver_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignment WHERE task_name LIKE '%delivery%';
SELECT * FROM driver_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, start_time ASC
SELECT driver_id, schedule_date, start_time FROM driver_schedule WHERE driver_id = 3
SELECT driver_id, task_name, assign_date FROM assignment WHERE assign_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31'
SELECT * FROM assignment ORDER BY driver_id ASC, assign_date DESC
SELECT driver_id, task_name, task_description FROM assignment WHERE task_name LIKE '%delivery%'
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, assigned_vehicle FROM drivers;
SELECT vehicle_type, capacity, status FROM vehicles;
SELECT schedule_id, driver_id, vehicle_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, assigned_vehicle, availability FROM drivers;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT driver_name, assigned_vehicle, availability FROM drivers WHERE assigned_vehicle IS NOT NULL;

SELECT driver_name, vehicle_type, start_time, end_time FROM drivers d JOIN schedules s ON d.driver_id = s.driver_id JOIN vehicles v ON s.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE v.status = 'available' ORDER BY start_time DESC;

SELECT d.driver_id, d.driver_name, v.vehicle_type, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM drivers d JOIN schedules s ON d.driver_id = s.driver_id JOIN vehicles v ON s.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE s.end_time > NOW();
SELECT driver_name, assigned_vehicle, vehicle_type, status FROM drivers d LEFT JOIN schedules s ON d.driver_id = s.driver_id LEFT JOIN vehicles v ON s.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE v.capacity >= 3;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driver_id FROM drivers;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_status FROM assignments WHERE assignment_status='Completed';
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;

SELECT driver_name, schedule_date, assignment_status FROM drivers JOIN schedules ON drivers.driver_id = schedules.driver_id JOIN assignments ON drivers.driver_id = assignments.driver_id WHERE assignment_status='Pending';
SELECT driver_name, schedule_date FROM drivers, schedules WHERE drivers.driver_id = schedules.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id IN (SELECT driver_id FROM schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-09-15');
SELECT DISTINCT driver_name AS Name, assignment_status AS Status FROM drivers JOIN assignments ON drivers.driver_id = assignments.driver_id;
SELECT MAX(schedule_time) AS Latest_Time, MIN(schedule_time) AS Earliest_Time FROM schedules;
SELECT driver_name, count(schedule_id) AS Total_Schedules FROM drivers INNER JOIN schedules ON drivers.driver_id = schedules.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM drivers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE capacity > 5;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT name, type, quantity FROM resources WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM drivers WHERE license_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND end_time <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT driver_id, vehicle_id, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_assignments FROM assignments GROUP BY driver_id, vehicle_id;
